title: Sun Pharma gets approval for Wegovy-style weight loss shot
summary: India’s Sun Pharma readies to launch generic semaglutide for weight management after patent expiry in 2026. Weight-loss New Year plans may have already slipped quietly out of view; not because people lack willpower, but because biology is an uncharitable negotiator. Diet plans, workout routines and lifestyle advice can help, yet for millions they function less […] The post Sun Pharma gets approval for Wegovy-style weight loss shot appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
